author: Josh Gerstein
title: U.S. prisons' virus-related release policies prompt confusion
description: ‘It’s crazy how they’re doing this,’ one inmate’s spouse said.
content:
Wives of inmates at a medium-security federal prison in Cumberland, Maryland told POLITICO the facility is using its special housing unit or SHU to hold both categories of prisoners.
Theyre quarantining these healthy inmates with sick inmates that are alread… [+7088 chars]
